name: NU_MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusIgGAntibodyQuantitativeInSerum
title: NU_Measles (Tests for measles virus IgG Antibody [Quantitative] in Serum)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles virus IgG Antibody (quantitative results) in Serum),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Measles virus IgG Ab; system = serum;  

LOINC search: "Measles virus IgG Ab (serum) -panel -interpretation Scale:QN -rubella -ratio"),(Exclusion Criteria: Panel test, ratio test and interpretation tests)
